## Source: amazon-inspector (5b7e92deb9c473f963b37b51df844bbea3a31ce650797efd9e410e27219be1f2)
The package @kyriba/ui-workspace was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (83780ddcc7a56870552fa9729ccf3b3d73f3c52e5aac5720002db13dd6d76d51)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@kyriba/ui-workspace' @ 1.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
